text:
Using latest (1.3.29) Apache on Netware 6 SP3 produces the following for every
client request in the error_log:

[Mon Apr 19 08:44:00 2004] [info] [client 10.2.2.16] XSrvCollectHeader()
[Mon Apr 19 08:44:00 2004] [info] [client 10.2.2.16] XSrvCollectHeader: NOT_NOVELL
[Mon Apr 19 08:44:00 2004] [info] [client 10.2.2.16] xsrv_fix_auth_header()

It fills the disk space very quickly (hudreds of MB per day.

The problem was already in 1.3.27 (no idea if also before), upgrading to 1.3.29
didn't help.
creator: komanek@natur.cuni.cz
